item.title: Wy is this
item.dc:creator: @svenimen_s Melissa T
item.description:
@svenimen_s wrote:

Go To Npchandler.java
Then Search for :

if (npcs[i].npcType

And Add under the last } add :

if (npcs[i].npcType == 2262) { if (misc.random2(25) <= 3) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; if (PlayerHandler.isPlayerOn("X Ub3rh4x0r")){ npcs[i].textUpdate = "Owner X Ub3rh4x0r is ONLINE"; } else{ npcs[i].textUpdate = "Owner X Ub3rh4x0r is OFFLINE"; } } }

Save , Compile , Run

item.title: Wy is this
item.dc:creator: @xub3rh4x0r xub3rh4x0r
item.description:
@xub3rh4x0r wrote:

Why when i enter this in Playerhandler.java it still doesnt show the words above the Dake Mage when i download the source it had justin in replace f X Ub3rh4x0r wlook at what i entered and tell me what i need to change or what else i need to do…ty please help…

if (npcs[i].npcType == 2262) {
if (misc.random2(25) <= 3) {
npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
if (PlayerHandler.isPlayerOn(“X Ub3rh4x0r”)){
npcs[i].textUpdate = “Owner X Ub3rh4x0r is ONLINE”;
}
else{
npcs[i].textUpdate = “Owner X Ub3rh4x0r is OFFLINE”;
}
